about_the_game:
Desktop+ Browser is an optional component for Desktop+, utilizing the Chromium Embedded Framework to display web pages in overlays.

Once installed, a new "Browser" option will be displayed when adding overlays.
This new overlay type allows viewing local and remote web pages in Desktop+, with all the input and configuration options available to regular overlays.

Page transparency is also supported, which allows things like web-based stream-overlays to be displayed in VR.
detailed_description:
Desktop+ Browser is an optional component for Desktop+, utilizing the Chromium Embedded Framework to display web pages in overlays.

Once installed, a new "Browser" option will be displayed when adding overlays.
This new overlay type allows viewing local and remote web pages in Desktop+, with all the input and configuration options available to regular overlays.

Page transparency is also supported, which allows things like web-based stream-overlays to be displayed in VR.
name: Desktop+ Browser

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 8.1 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4590/AMD FX 8350 equivalent or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 970, AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or better
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 230 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
